headline: Argus is Positive on Masco Corporation (MAS)
summary: Masco Corporation (NYSE:MAS) is one of the best industrial stocks to buy. On November 4, the Fly reported that Chris Graja from Argus maintained a Buy recommendation on Masco but trimmed the price target on the shares from $82 to $80. According to the analyst, the business underwent a transformation that allowed it to deal […]
